title: Scarlett Johansson is uncharacteristically dressed down with unbrushed hair
text:
The last time Scarlett Johansson was photographed she was in glam dresses while at the Toronto Film Festival.

So it was a shock to see the 34-year-old movie icon so dressed down when she walked through JFK airport in New York on Thursday.

The beauty kept her head down as she wore brown tinted sunglasses and was covered up in layers of clothing.

No glam: Scarlett Johansson was dressed down when she walked through JFK airport in New York on Thursday

The Avengers actress tried her hardest to hide her figure in an orange sweater with a nondescript black jacket and matching slacks.

And instead of heels, the Match Point star went with a sensible pair of white sneakers from Adidas.

Johansson had her hair down and unbrushed with minimal makeup. She carried a bag on each shoulder as she was escorted through the airport by a guide.

The only thing about Scarlett that was flashy was her large diamond engagement ring from her beau Colin Jost who is a regular on Saturday Night Live.

She left her skintight dresses at home: The Avengers actress tried her hardest to hide her figure in an orange sweater with a nondescript black jacket

The two became engaged in May after two years of dating.

This will be Jost's first marriage, while Johansson was previously married to Ryan Reynolds (2008-2010) and Romain Dauriac (2014-2017).

She has a daughter, five-year-old Rose, with Dauriac, a journalist in France.

Scarlett and Colin kept their relationship relatively private.

Bling it on! The only thing about Scarlett that was flashy was her large diamond engagement ring from her beau Colin Jost who is a regular on Saturday Night Live

But in 2017 at the Emmys he did tell ET: 'She’s wonderful. She’s working, so otherwise, she’d be here. She’s pretty cool. It’s hard to have a lot of complaints, she’s pretty awesome…I’m very happy. I feel very lucky.'

In September, Johnasson ensured all eyes would be on her as she attended the premiere of her new film Jojo Rabbit at the Toronto International Film Festival.

Clad in a glamorous metallic gown, the actress was a vision of beauty on the night.

The New York City native turned more than a few heads when she stepped into the spotlight in a silver spaghetti-strap dress.

Yes, Colin, you are lucky: in 2017 at the Emmys he did tell ET: 'She’s wonderful. She’s working, so otherwise, she’d be here. She’s pretty cool. It’s hard to have a lot of complaints, she’s pretty awesome…I’m very happy. I feel very lucky.' Seen in April

The blingy number hugged her famous curves and had a wrap-around pattern near the waistline that went all the way to just below her hips.

Keeping things perfectly coordinated, she wore matching strapped-heels and had her long blonde tresses pulled back into a bun. She accessorized with some silver necklaces, bracelet and earrings.

Johansson, who's earned the title of highest paid actress in Hollywood, posed solo in front of the sea of photographers.

Star bright: Johansson commanded attention on the red carpet for the premiere of Jojo Rabbit at the Toronto International Film Festival

Jojo Rabbit tells the story of lonely German boy Jojo 'Rabbit' Betzler (Roman Griffin Davis) during World War II,

His worldview gets turned upside down when he discovers his single mother (Scarlett Johansson) is hiding a young Jewish girl (Thomasin McKenzie) in their attic.

The only person he feels he can trust and count on is his imaginary friend, an idiotic version of Adolf Hitler (Taiki Waititi).

Jojo Rabbit hits theaters in the US October 18.

After that she can be seen as Natasha Romanoff / Black Widow in the stand alone film Black Widow, due out May 2020. And she is also lending her voice to Sing 2.
